DOC.brief_summary: This study compare efficacy 3 dos vardenafil , 5 mg , 10 mg 20 mg , match placebo Chinese male ED patient , treat maximum 12 week .
DOC.brief_title: BAY38-9456 ( Vardenafil HCL Tablet ) ED Treatment China Registration .
DOC.criteria: Men ED 6 month . ED define accord National Institute Health , USA Department Health Human Services , consensus statement , inability attain and/or maintain penile erection sufficient satisfactory sexual performance . Stable heterosexual relationship Primary hypoactive sexual desire History myocardial infarction , stroke lifethreatening arrhythmia within 6month period prior Visit 1 ( Week 4 ) Nitrate use Other exclusion criterion apply
